traceability.evidence:
The auto-update feature is fully implemented and covered by multiple tests:
• src/print-outdated.js delegates to updatePackages when --update is set • src/update-packages.js supports preview (logging ‘The following packages will be updated’), confirmation prompt, --yes skip flag, backup creation (package.json.backup), package.json modification (JSON.stringify with 2-space indent), summary logging, install reminder, and error handling for backup/write failures
Tests exercising this functionality all pass: – test/printOutdated.update.test.js verifies safe updates, backup, package.json changes, and summary logs – test/printOutdated.updatePromptAbort.test.js verifies interactive abort behavior – test/update-packages.test.js tests direct updatePackages behavior, including skipConfirmation, backup, applyUpdates, and error logs – test/printOutdated.updateBackupError.test.js verifies backup error handling – test/functional-assessment.test.js includes an E2E test for prompts/011.0-DEV-AUTO-UPDATE, confirming --update -y updates package.json and creates backup
traceability.notes: All acceptance criteria for prompts/011.0-DEV-AUTO-UPDATE.md are satisfied: --update flag, safe-only updates, preview & confirm, --yes flag, backup, formatting preserved (2-space JSON), summary report, install prompt, and graceful error handling are all implemented and validated by tests.
